ing: 1/3 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coffee flavored liqueur
1/3 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger creme de menthe liqueur
1/3 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger Irish cream liqueur
des: "Coffee, creme de menthe and Irish cream mingle in this shot that tastes like a chocolate mint candy."
ins: In a shot glass, combine the coffee liqueur, creme de menthe, and Irish cream liqueur. Drink all at once.
